description.p: Plots makes it easy to visualise mathematical formulae. In addition to basic arithmetic operations, it supports trigonometric, hyperbolic, exponential and logarithmic functions, as well as arbitrary sums and products. It can display polar equations, and both implicit and explicit Cartesian equations.
Plots is designed to integrate well with the GNOME desktop and takes advantage of modern hardware using OpenGL.

Plots facilita la visualización de fórmulas matemáticas. Además de las operaciones aritméticas básicas, admite funciones trigonométricas, hiperbólicas, exponenciales y logarítmicas, así como sumas y productos arbitrarios. Puede mostrar ecuaciones polares y ecuaciones cartesianas implícitas y explícitas.
Plots está diseñado para integrarse bien con el escritorio GNOME y aprovecha el hardware moderno usando OpenGL.

Plots permet de visualiser facilement des formules mathémathiques. En plus des opérations arithmétiques de base, il prend en charge les fonctions trigonométriques, hyperboliques, exponentielles et logarithmiques, ainsi que les sommes et produits arbitraires. Il peut afficher des equations polaires et des equations cartésiennes, implicites et explicites.
Plots est conçu pour bien s'intégrer au bureau GNOME et exploite le matériel moderne en utilisant OpenGL.

Program Grafikoni olakšava vizualizaciju matematičkih formula. Osim osnovnih aritmetičkih operacija, podržava trigonometrijske, hiperboličke, eksponencijalne i logaritamske funkcije, kao i proizvoljne zbrojeve i umnoške. Može prikazati polarne jednadžbe, te implicitne i eksplicitne kartezijanske jednadžbe.
Program Grafikoni izrađen je na način da se dobro integrira u GNOME okruženje te koristi prednosti modernog hardvera pomoću OpenGL-a.

ul.li: New feature: implicit equations in x and y;
Added Czech, Hungarian, Italian, Lithuanian, Norwegian and Turkish translations.
Added support for equations of the form x = f(y);
Added support for polar equations of the forms r = f(θ) and θ = f(r);
Added support for custom logarithm bases;
Refined the grid appearance, and added grid labels;

description.p: Fix help missing in Flatpak

ul.li: Added zoom in, out and reset buttons;

description.p: Added floor and ceiling functions. Bugfixes and refactoring.
Various bugfixes and code improvements. Added missing cosech, asech, acsch, acosech and acoth functions.
Added keyboard shortcuts for undo and redo
New feature: undo/redo. Various bugfixes.
New feature: cut, copy and paste of formulae!
New feature: variables and sliders. Easily modify the parameters in your equations with just a click!
Also added a shortcut to select all the contents of a formula box, and updated the in-app documentation.
Improved the UI and added coloured graphs!
UI improvements to formula editors:

ul.li: Formula editing boxes can now scroll horizontally, and the formula pane now only scrolls vertically;
Formulae scroll to the cursor position when it moves.
